title: League of legends players are too soft
body: I found a list of banned league words and i dont undetstand why would words like shit,fuck,smartass,skeez,sheep,scam,%%%%%%%%%,ass and sheepShagger??? be bannable

replies.body:
Barring the "%%%%%%%%%" which is everybody guess what it even is, and possibly sheep shagger, the rest are nowhere near being bannable.

Also, imagine being so tough that you have to let others know about it across the internet in a video game chat.

> [{quoted}](name=Kamille W,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rFBiBlZ3,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-03-16T14:16:01.351+0000)
>
> You, sir, are my spirt animal!

I don't think you're reading the meaning he intended to convey. :p

>I found a list of banned league words

No you didn't.

They are not, however they are not recommended and are usually used in derogitory terms.

For example, going "f..." after you got ganked and died, that is generally not punished. However going "you are f...ing sh.." that is in the realm of toxic behavior and too much will cause you to get punished.

That said.... Take an english class or open a book. You do not need to use those words to convey meaning, nor do they help in any way. The fact that most people overuse them, does not mean that they should be used or allowed. It does not do anything except help someone express anger, and with anger going towards someone else that becomes flame. Flame neither helps win a game nor does it help anyone feel better.
____

Tell me honestly, when you absolutely cuss someone out and flame them.... do they play better? Do you feel better? Does it make you feel good if they feel horrible because you put the blame on them? For most people.... to all but the trolls.... it does not.

Does it usually mean that trolls are absolutely laughing at your anger? Yes.

Think about it.

> [{quoted}](name=Silly Neeko,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rFBiBlZ3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-03-16T13:03:09.204+0000)
>
> They are not, however they are not recommended and are usually used in derogitory terms.
> 
> For example, going "f..." after you got ganked and died, that is generally not punished. However going "you are f...ing sh.." that is in the realm of toxic behavior and too much will cause you to get punished.
> 
> That said.... Take an english class or open a book. You do not need to use those words to convey meaning, nor do they help in any way. The fact that most people overuse them, does not mean that they should be used or allowed. It does not do anything except help someone express anger, and with anger going towards someone else that becomes flame. Flame neither helps win a game nor does it help anyone feel better.
> ____
> 
> Tell me honestly, when you absolutely cuss someone out and flame them.... do they play better? Do you feel better? Does it make you feel good if they feel horrible because you put the blame on them? For most people.... to all but the trolls.... it does not.
> 
> Does it usually mean that trolls are absolutely laughing at your anger? Yes.
> 
> Think about it.

It makes me feel good to cuss someone out that's been flaming me all game. It relieves anger

> [{quoted}](name=epic style bro,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rFBiBlZ3,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-03-16T16:49:29.492+0000)
>
> It makes me feel good to cuss someone out that's been flaming me all game. It relieves anger

Sure, it feels good in the moment, but in the end, its' destructive towards the overall goal of winning a competitive game.

> [{quoted}](name=HallPanter,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rFBiBlZ3,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-03-16T12:49:50.848+0000)
>
> I found a list of banned league words and i dont undetstand why would words like shit,fuck,smartass,skeez,sheep,scam,%%%%%%%%%,ass and sheepShagger??? be bannable

You are the kind of player I report every single time. Even if we win.

> [{quoted}](name=HallPanter,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rFBiBlZ3,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-03-16T12:49:50.848+0000)
>
> I found a list of banned league words and i dont undetstand why would words like shit,fuck,smartass,skeez,sheep,scam,%%%%%%%%%,ass and sheepShagger??? be bannable

That's a list of censored words for people that choose to keep the vulgar language filter. It has nothing to do with the so called "banwords".

> [{quoted}](name=HallPanter,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rFBiBlZ3,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-03-16T12:49:50.848+0000)
>
> I found a list of banned league words and i dont undetstand why would words like shit,fuck,smartass,skeez,sheep,scam,%%%%%%%%%,ass and sheepShagger??? be bannable

It's not the players, it's the generation. Go outside, interact with them and you will see that they aren't only soft but a lot of other uninspiring things as well. It's not their fault though. Most of their mommies and daddies made them that way.

I'm presuming you also have a problem with generational shifts allowing women to work outside the house? Or permitting women to travel without a man present? Or allowing women to vote or run for office?

Sure, it may be a generational shift. That doesn't mean it's a bad thing, nor does it mean it's "soft".

> [{quoted}](name=rujitra,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rFBiBlZ3,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-03-16T18:22:44.314+0000)
>
> I'm presuming you also have a problem with generational shifts allowing women to work outside the house? Or permitting women to travel without a man present? Or allowing women to vote or run for office?
> 
> Sure, it may be a generational shift. That doesn't mean it's a bad thing, nor does it mean it's "soft".

Tell yourself whatever you need to tell yourself and assume whatever helps you sleep at night. You might not be this way but most of your generation is. Social media has made it next to impossible for your generation to have a free mind and most of you piggyback on what social media thinks. This country and more importantly this world is heading down a very dark path because you are ignorant as to how to express your feelings without being corrupted by social media.

And for your information I might just be a woman? How do you feel now? That's what happens when you assume things about someone you don't know. You have some growing up to do like it or not but you really do.
You didn't answer my question.

> [{quoted}](name=rujitra,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rFBiBlZ3,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2019-03-16T22:29:40.672+0000)
>
> You didn't answer my question.

You are assuming you know my gender? How can you ask a question like that without knowing who you are talking to? Your response tells me a lot about you and why RIOT needs to remove that specialist tag. You have no idea how to deal with people. Consider yourself reported. If you do not change your behavior I will make out a ticket and explain to customer service why they need to get rid of you. The proof is in this thread.

> [{quoted}](name=dragfin12,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rFBiBlZ3,comment-id=00030000000000000000,timestamp=2019-03-16T23:14:35.619+0000)
>
> You are assuming you know my gender? How can you ask a question like that without knowing who you are talking to? Your response tells me a lot about you and why RIOT needs to remove that specialist tag. You have no idea how to deal with people. Consider yourself reported. If you do not change your behavior I will make out a ticket and explain to customer service why they need to get rid of you. The proof is in this thread.

"It's not the players, it's the generation. Go outside, interact with them and you will see that they aren't only soft but a lot of other uninspiring things as well. It's not their fault though. Most of their mommies and daddies made them that way."
->
"You have no idea how to deal with people. Consider yourself reported. If you do not change your behavior I will make out a ticket and explain to customer service why they need to get rid of you. The proof is in this thread."

WhenItSuitsYou. Amrite?

My question has nothing to do with gender. I mentioned multiple other things that occurred because of generational shifts. I am asking if you think those are bad just because older generations may not have liked it.
But you can assume to know their generation? Are we still in the just blame millennial stage? Most people complaing about millennials don't even realize they are one too.

> [{quoted}](name=dragfin12,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rFBiBlZ3,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2019-03-16T22:07:06.675+0000)
>
> Tell yourself whatever you need to tell yourself and assume whatever helps you sleep at night. You might not be this way but most of your generation is. Social media has made it next to impossible for your generation to have a free mind and most of you piggyback on what social media thinks. This country and more importantly this world is heading down a very dark path because you are ignorant as to how to express your feelings without being corrupted by social media.
> 
> And for your information I might just be a woman? How do you feel now? That's what happens when you assume things about someone you don't know. You have some growing up to do like it or not but you really do.

Nice question dodge there, lou.

League players need to be honest shit, fuck, smartass, and ass are not bannable I say this kind of SHIT on the daily its all in the way you use them so if youre using them to insult people maybe just be less of a dick?

There are two sides of the coin. 
As an older whippersnapper I definitely think things have gone to far as everyone seems to be offended by anything before you even finish your sentence. However, it's the intent that matters to me most. I'm generally a nice guy, but instead of people teaching me politely what they find offensive, they spit at me. (sometimes they're nice)
Makes for a gentlemanly game
